mapper.select:
/*WELLS - 월별 재지급 관리 목록조회 ( 판매자별 )*/ WITH MAIN AS ( SELECT M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM /*발생년월*/ , M.PERF_YM /*실적년월*/ , M.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , M.OG_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'REDF_ADSB_DV_CD', M.REDF_ADSB_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS REDF_ADSB_DV_NM /*지급구분*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '0' THEN (CASE WHEN M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, 0) END) END), 0) AS PR_ADSB_AMT /*개인 재지급액*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD != '0' THEN (CASE WHEN M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, 0) END) END), 0) AS OG_ADSB_AMT /*조직 재지급액*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(M.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, 0) END) , 0) AS SUM_ADSB_AMT /*재지급액계*/
, M.PERF_DV_CD /*실적구분코드*/ , A.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급*/ , A1.OG_CD /*소속코드*/ , A1.PRTNR_KNM /*성명*/ , A.CLTN_DT /*해약년월*/ , A.BZ_STAT_CD /*해약여부*/ FROM TB_FEDD_FEE_REDF_ADSB_BAS M /*수수료되물림재지급기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL A ON M.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS A1 ON M.PRTNR_NO = A1.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = A1.OG_TP_CD
WHERE M.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND M.REDF_ADSB_DV_CD = '03' /*재지급 고정*/
/* WELLS-M 일때 ALC 포함 */ AND M.OG_TP_CD IN (#{ogTpCd} , 'ALC') /*PARAM: 조직유형*/
AND M.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*PARAM: 조직유형*/
AND M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = #{redfAdsbOcYm} /*PARAM: 발생년월*/
AND M.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /*PARAM: 파트너번호*/
GROUP BY M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM, M.PERF_YM, M.PRTNR_NO, M.OG_TP_CD, M.REDF_ADSB_DV_CD, M.PERF_DV_CD , A.PSTN_DV_CD, A1.OG_CD, A1.PRTNR_KNM, A.CLTN_DT, A.BZ_STAT_CD ) SELECT M.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM /*발생년월*/ , M.PERF_YM /*실적년월*/ , A.OG_CD /*소속코드*/ , M.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , A.PRTNR_KNM /*성명*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'DDTN_RPLC_WELLS_PSTN_DV_CD', A.PSTN_DV_CD, #{session.langId}) AS RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , SUBSTR(A.CLTN_DT, 1, 6) AS CLTN_YM /*해약년월*/ , M.REDF_ADSB_DV_NM /*지급구분*/ , M.PR_ADSB_AMT /*개인 재지급액*/ , M.OG_ADSB_AMT /*조직 재지급액*/ , M.SUM_ADSB_AMT /*재지급액계*/ FROM MAIN M /*수수료되물림재지급기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A /*월파트너내역*/ ON M.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND M.PERF_YM = A.BASE_YM /*실적년월 = 월파트너기준년월*/ WHERE 1 = 1
/*ASIS 조건 대로 실적구분과 직급을 동시에*/ AND (CASE WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '0' AND TO_NUMBER(M.PSTN_DV_CD) >= 7 THEN '0' /*'개인'*/ WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '1' AND TO_NUMBER(M.PSTN_DV_CD) >= 10 THEN '1' /*'지구'*/ WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '2' AND TO_NUMBER(M.PSTN_DV_CD) = 7 THEN '2' /*'지점'*/ WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '5' AND TO_NUMBER(M.PSTN_DV_CD) = 4 THEN '5' /*'지역단장'*/ WHEN M.PERF_DV_CD = '6' AND TO_NUMBER(M.PSTN_DV_CD) = 2 THEN '7' /*'총괄단장'*/ ELSE M.PERF_DV_CD END) = (CASE WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '15' THEN '0' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '10' THEN '1' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '7' THEN '2' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '4' THEN '5' WHEN #{pstnDvCd} = '2' THEN '7' END) /*PARAM: 직급구분 (개인: 0, 지구: 1, 지점: 2, 지역: 5, 총괄: 7) (pstnDvCd, 15: 웰스플래너, 10: 지구장, 7: 지점장, 4: 지역단장, 2: 총괄단장)*/
AND A.BZ_STAT_CD = '2' /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
AND A.BZ_STAT_CD IN ('1', '3') /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/

/*WELLS - 월별 재지급 관리 목록조회 ( 계약별 )*/ WITH SELL_ADSB AS ( SELECT M1.PRTNR_NO , M1.OG_TP_CD , M1.CNTR_NO , M1.CNTR_SN , M1.PERF_YM , T3.PRTNR_KNM , T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT AS PERF_DT /*귀속일자*/ , SUBSTR(M1.FST_RGST_DTM, 1, 8) AS OC_DT , SUM(NVL2(M1.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, M1.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, M1.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT)) AS SELL_PRTNR_ADSB_AMT /*재지급액*/ FROM TB_FEDD_FEE_REDF_ADSB_DTL M1 /*개인*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL T1 ON M1.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND M1.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON M1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND M1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T3 ON M1.PRTNR_NO = T3.PRTNR_NO AND M1.OG_TP_CD = T3.OG_TP_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND M1.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = #{redfAdsbOcYm} /*PARAM: 발생년월*/ AND M1.PERF_DV_CD = '0' /*개인 고정*/ AND M1.REDF_ADSB_DV_CD = '03' /*재지급 고정*/
AND M1.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*PARAM: 조직유형*/
AND M1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /*PARAM: 파트너번호*/
AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD = '2' /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD IN ('1', '3') /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
GROUP BY M1.PRTNR_NO, M1.OG_TP_CD, M1.CNTR_NO, M1.CNTR_SN, M1.PERF_YM, M1.FST_RGST_DTM, T3.PRTNR_KNM, T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT ), BRCH_ADSB AS ( SELECT M1.PRTNR_NO , M1.OG_TP_CD , M1.CNTR_NO , M1.CNTR_SN , M1.PERF_YM , T3.PRTNR_KNM , T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT AS PERF_DT /*귀속일자*/ , SUBSTR(M1.FST_RGST_DTM, 1, 8) AS OC_DT , SUM(NVL2(M1.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, M1.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, M1.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT)) AS BRCH_ADSB_AMT /*재지급액*/ FROM TB_FEDD_FEE_REDF_ADSB_DTL M1 /*지점장*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL T1 ON M1.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND M1.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON M1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND M1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T3 ON M1.PRTNR_NO = T3.PRTNR_NO AND M1.OG_TP_CD = T3.OG_TP_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND M1.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = #{redfAdsbOcYm} /*PARAM: 발생년월*/ AND M1.PERF_DV_CD = '2' /*지점장 고정*/ AND M1.REDF_ADSB_DV_CD = '03' /*재지급 고정*/
AND M1.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*PARAM: 조직유형*/
AND M1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /*PARAM: 파트너번호*/
AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD = '2' /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD IN ('1', '3') /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
GROUP BY M1.PRTNR_NO, M1.OG_TP_CD, M1.CNTR_NO, M1.CNTR_SN, M1.PERF_YM, M1.FST_RGST_DTM, T3.PRTNR_KNM, T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT ), B2B AS ( SELECT M1.PRTNR_NO , M1.OG_TP_CD , M1.CNTR_NO , M1.CNTR_SN , M1.PERF_YM , T3.PRTNR_KNM , T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT AS PERF_DT /*귀속일자*/ , SUBSTR(M1.FST_RGST_DTM, 1, 8) AS OC_DT , SUM(NVL2(M1.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT, M1.REDF_ADSB_OC_AMT, M1.REDF_ADSB_CTR_CNFM_AMT)) AS ADSB_AMT /*재지급액*/ FROM TB_FEDD_FEE_REDF_ADSB_DTL M1 /*지점장*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL T1 ON M1.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND M1.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 ON M1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND M1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T3 ON M1.PRTNR_NO = T3.PRTNR_NO AND M1.OG_TP_CD = T3.OG_TP_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND M1.REDF_ADSB_OC_YM = #{redfAdsbOcYm} /*PARAM: 발생년월*/ AND M1.PERF_DV_CD = '2' /*지점장 고정*/ AND M1.REDF_ADSB_DV_CD = '03' /*재지급 고정*/ AND M1.OG_TP_CD = 'W04'
AND M1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /*PARAM: 파트너번호*/
AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD = '2' /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD IN ('1', '3') /*PARAM: 해약여부, 1:사업 3:휴업, 2: 해약*/
GROUP BY M1.PRTNR_NO, M1.OG_TP_CD, M1.CNTR_NO, M1.CNTR_SN, M1.PERF_YM, M1.FST_RGST_DTM, T3.PRTNR_KNM, T2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT ) SELECT A.OC_DT /*처리일자*/ , A.PERF_DT /*귀속일자*/ , A.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , A.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , A.CNTR_NO_SN /*계약상세번호*/ , A.PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , A.PRTNR_KNM /*파트너성명*/ , A.SELL_PRTNR_ADSB_AMT /*판매자 재지급액*/ , A.BRCH_PRTNR_NO /*지점장 번호*/ , A.BRCH_PRTNR_KNM /*지점장 성명*/ , A.BRCH_ADSB_AMT /*지점장 재지급액*/ FROM ( SELECT
M.OC_DT /*처리일자*/ , M.PERF_DT , M.CNTR_NO , M.CNTR_SN , M.CNTR_NO || M.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_NO_SN , M.PRTNR_NO , M.PRTNR_KNM , NVL(M.SELL_PRTNR_ADSB_AMT, 0) AS SELL_PRTNR_ADSB_AMT , S.PRTNR_NO AS BRCH_PRTNR_NO , S.PRTNR_KNM AS BRCH_PRTNR_KNM , NVL(S.BRCH_ADSB_AMT, 0) AS BRCH_ADSB_AMT FROM SELL_ADSB M LEFT OUTER JOIN BRCH_ADSB S ON M.CNTR_NO = S.CNTR_NO AND M.CNTR_SN = S.CNTR_SN
UNION ALL SELECT
M.OC_DT /*처리일자*/ , M.PERF_DT , M.CNTR_NO , M.CNTR_SN , M.CNTR_NO || M.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_NO_SN , M.PRTNR_NO , M.PRTNR_KNM , NVL(M.ADSB_AMT, 0) AS SELL_PRTNR_ADSB_AMT , M.PRTNR_NO AS BRCH_PRTNR_NO , M.PRTNR_KNM AS BRCH_PRTNR_KNM , NVL(M.ADSB_AMT, 0) AS BRCH_ADSB_AMT FROM B2B M
) A ORDER BY A.OC_DT, A.PERF_DT, A.PRTNR_NO /* 조회결과: 발생년월-실적년월-소속코드-번호 오름차순으로 노출(설계서 반영) */
